Headline: 63rd-bound Green Line Delays
ShortDescription: 63rd-bound Green Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier sick customer at Oak Park. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
63rd-bound Green Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier sick customer at Oak Park. 

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #50 Damen Temporary Reroute at Damen/ Haddon
ShortDescription: 50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted via Damen, Augusta, Ashland, Division and Damen due to street blockage near Damen/Haddon.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Damen, Augusta, Ashland, Division and Damen due to street blockage near Damen/Haddon.

Allow extra travel time.
